text:
Hey bestie XD
Jaipur ab meri bhi fav city hai :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Please stop being afraid of me, har cheez pe nahi hoti main offend :P You’re really fun to hang out with, kab time nikal jata hai pata nahi chalta. Also, your ppt voice is hilarious, keep that up XD I hope we get to have more information dissemination sessions in the future :P 
P.S. Ofcourse you’re invited to my wedding (check your DM)
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Gupta yaaaar, you’re like that super fun uncle of the group who plans every fun trip and makes sure the kids are having fun :P (yes i’m pulling your leg coz of your age :P) In first year, I was scared about MSE coz I didn’t know anyone and then we met that fateful night in CCD. Bas pata chal gaya tha tab, ki sab sahi hoga. You and Anany took care of me when I was collapsing in the library and made sure that I got every emotion out which was bothering me then. I felt so happy that night after talking to you guys, thanks for always hyping me up. Also, tu jab bhi drunk hoke merko text karta hai maza aa jata hai, it’s super cute, please keep doing that  <3 Mocha night hamesha yaad rahegi, zoo wala day bhi kitna awesome tha, and then the time you and Anany went for the open mic. First week se jante hai but abhi tak trip nahi ho payi, I hope we amend that soon. Future plans jo hai tere, unke liye all the best, I know you’ll crush them <3 Always stay the same! Love you!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: HI <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: I miss sitting with you on the grass in front of L20 and discussing random-ass things between classes :(
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Amitji <3 Haha I don’t even remember why I put this as your nickname but I faintly recollect you being pissed at this lol. Aapki energy and cuteness to poore IITK Y17 ko hi pata hai, isliye aapko mama banaya gaya shayad XD Also, I remember when we came back from Blue World and were worried about Swapnil’s injury, you still stopped to have golgappe or something lol, that kinda carefree attitude is rare and does sometimes help in these stressful situations ig. You’re someone who I would say has changed the most in these 4 years, Anany, Gupta, Kush et al would attest to this fact ig. I remember being amazed at your innocence in first year (you wouldn’t even talk to anyone of us properly lol) and being shocked when sweaty-drunk you intercepted me for a hug in front of Mama mio :P What a transition! Chapuness max to aap ho hi. Stay the same and say hello to Maria for me XD All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey! The Design course was bearable because of you, thanks for that! All the best for your future!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: I have always felt an odd sense of kinship to you, maybe because we’re both single children or what, idk. But it’s amazing to know that you will always get me, understand my emotions due to that connection we share, which includes opinions about anime-watching people haha :P Thanks for listening to my repeated rants about my heartbreak in 5th semester over and over again. You’re fucking amazing you know that right? I’m so glad that we had that drunken conversation in Goa because now I know we will never let each other drift away for stupid reasons (and that includes you being in Bangalore and me potentially in Gurgaon). Also Team Deserts ftw <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

I wanna do that on everyone's page now XD
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Akshat, remember the time you gave me a ride on your cycle from tut block to L20 on day1 intern season? You were my lifesaver that day, thanks so much for that XD Apart from that, I’ve found you very calm and collected, I do wish we had interacted more. Let’s keep in touch and all the very best to you!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Akshay, if I had to say who is the most enthusiastic person in IITK I would definitely say your name. Be it a small get together, birthday planning or a 7-day trip, your enthusiasm is super infectious. There are so many memories with you that a memoir can’t be filled with them all. Although my favourite is when we inadvertently took Hemant’s counselling session and the dinner in Liquid afterwards XD I remember in first year when you first gave me that lamp as a birthday gift even before my birthday, things like that and all your efforts you put, with the biggest smile on your face too, into your friendships are just amazing to me. Faizan was absolutely right that evening in Goa, people don’t appreciate you enough. Being guilty of that myself, I wanna tell you how important you are to me and the group.
Also, I hate that I had to miss your sister’s wedding for that stupid quiz, I do regret that a lot. I’m also amazed at your passion for SAE, regardless of personal or academic commitments, you’ve put the team first and that’s extremely admirable. Anyway, we still have had a lot of fun in our time and I know we’ll continue to do so! We’ll meet soon! 
P.S. Love your mocktails and cocktails ofc and that pasta we cooked remember? Lol fun times <3
P.P.S. Love the portrait, specially the depiction of the one who hangs in the middle :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Pandey ji! Aapke saath TA lab was so fun! You are one of the most hardworking people in MSE and I wanna thank you for all your help always! All the very best for your future!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey name, birthday and city neighbour! I remember being utterly shocked on seeing the calm person I had been sitting beside for the past week dancing on “Laila main laila” like a star on the orientation stage. We did become great friends after that, thanks to Kush’s grand treat :P First year outings will always be super memorable and special for me because of you <3 You and Abhishek have been there for me on so many of my lowest points and have always managed to make me feel better in a short while, be it in 3rd semester in CCD or that walk in front of CS in 4th semester. Equally amazing have been the fun, lighter moments, like watching you dance at prom, making a rangoli with you on Diwali, going to your open mic, celebrating new years getting hammered with you guys or just randomly hanging out. There are literally so many memories, I can’t do justice to all of them here. It’s been amazing knowing you all and seeing you bond in a way that is really something out of this world. The image of watching you all cry (and Kushagra trying to :P) after your heart wrenching poem that evening in front of Hall 13 canteen will always be imprinted in my heart. You’ve always been the alpha, the leader of the pack but seeing you get emotional, something which was so in contrast with your usual fun-loving and sunny nature, was something that shook me up from inside and made the imminent departure quite real :( Thanks for that poem though, I hope you really get it out in video format like you were planning to, it’ll always remind of our time at IITK. Thanks for being a great friend and I know we’ll keep in touch. Whenever you feel low, just know I’m one text or call away. Love you loads!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Also, you need to thank me for being born XD
Ask Gunjan :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Anirudh, (first and last time calling you that ig XD) It’s always been fun, the few times we’ve hung out. I guess we’ll get many more chances, hopefully :P Love your high vibe! Stay the same and yeah keep debating! XD All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Anish, do you remember how we used to meet only during festivals and how surprising that was? Although, the once a semester, events ground catch-ups were really fun and I always had a good time with you. How can I not mention the Lucknow trip? It was so much fun! I didn’t think a day-long trip could be that amazing, so thanks for making it that way <3 You’re a really awesome person and I hope I could have known you better. All the best to you and let’s keep in touch, okay?
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Ham jitna randomly dost bane and the random way in which our lives became so interconnected now is just mind-blowing. I remember being 2 times happy on 11th August 2019 because you were with me in the same company and a year later when that became permanent <3 You are so full of life, cheerful and caring ki main kya hi batau. People say I act like their moms in terms of caring for them, but you are someone who cares for me that way. I cherish and miss those post midnight talks when you used to barge in my room and just start talking lol. I need you to always remember that you’re worth so much more than how people treat you sometimes and you don’t need to think twice before stopping them from crossing boundaries. Also, it feels very privileged to know now that you share so many things with me, I’ll always be there but I guess you know that.I feel that you’re gonna be the one in charge of my bachelorette party lol and it better be a fun one, okay? I can’t imagine how I could have said goodbye to you too on 26th if we weren’t going to the same place. It’s gonna be amazing Anshikaaaaaa. Tere morning/afternoon/evening kisses wale messages yaaaar, made the Goa trip and consequent months so fun. Also, yeah you’re the only girl I’ve kissed till now, hehe. I’m sorry for being selfish at that time, I didn’t know how to be there for you in a better manner. I’m glad that our roommates weren’t in IITK that summer and this beautiful sisterhood started developing and I got to see the utter cuteness that is you coming to sleep beside me in the middle of the night <3. Ab life me kuch bhi masala hota hai, you and Avisha are the ones on top of my call list <3 It is super crazy the jinxes we have, as I was writing this I got your call. I love you loads and we’ll have a blast in Gurgaon/Bangalore.
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Tu accha aadmi hai. <3
How did we go from people who sat beside each other for a semester and didn’t talk to people who bawled like a baby publicly when you were leaving campus? It has been quite a journey with you during lockdown. Those game nights and random-ass discussions were the one keeping me sane at home <3 Also 208 kaand yaar, kaise bhool sakte hai XD (Please don’t show that email to anyone, pretty please?) Also, you’re like my investment guru, have I told you this? The way you handled things after 3rd April has been quite mature and amazing and I somehow know you’re not gonna let this new dynamic come in the way of Perfectenschlags. “Future ki sochte hue” please ek trip pe chalte hai asap, apart from meeting in Surat ofc. Meet you soon, love you <3

text: Hey Arshdeep, you are someone who is always so supportive, such a good listener and an overall nice person. Meeting you was a random coincidence in PHY103. Thanks to you I got another good friend in my life <3 Stay this way always, so positive, caring and loving. I’m sorry about my flaky habits in terms of staying in touch, I’m working on that. You’ve always been there and I can’t thank you enough for that <3 Milte hai jald <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Arun, I’m so glad that I came to that party, I loved it, so stop thanking me for it everytime XD Pagal. You have been amazing these past 3 years and I wish we had met sooner. Tu itna amazing, itna chapu kaise hai yaar. I love to see you talk about the things and people you’re passionate about. It’s a privilege to be in the audience then.  And if I helped you in MSE, then you’ve been my rock too. From labs to library to canteen trips to that fateful bowling-Mocha evening, I’ve enjoyed every moment with you, there wasn’t a dull one. Remember the time you were sitting behind me on my cycle and you shouted “my nuts, my nuts” in front of like 50 odd people XD Man you’re hilarious. Thank you for taking the brunt of my emotional burden at times. I wish we could have sneaked in Butterscotch to class or had that post-lab samosa chai one last time but oh well, I’m trying not to cry so I’ll stop. Also, all-MSE trip yaar. Reh hi gayi. Banate hai future me pakka. I wish Gurgaon posting ho and I get to meet you super soon <3 Love you!

I look forward to that so much, pretty excited for it, eee. I don’t need to write “keep in touch” here and I’m so happy about that XD See you soon!

You are one of the most calm, sensible, sweet and mature people on campus and I really hope you stay this way. Accha aadmi hai tu <3 Hope we stay in touch Jai <3

text: Hey Monika, one of the founding members of Amex Bitches! XD Although, you’ve betrayed us and chosen Microsoft but it’s okay, we’ll forgive you after a treat. Honestly, it was so fun having the virtual intern experience with you. Sorry for bothering you so much about SPO related stuff XD Sharing that moment of getting the PPO notice with you both on call was the best phone call I’ve had! <3 Your yoga poses are ofcourse mind blowing, my whole wing has a crush on you for that (i’m not kidding) so keep them coming :P Hope we get to work together again. All the best for your future and yeah keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Prakhar! I think we started interacting more due to microeco? But anyway, it’s been a lot of fun, and relief, having you in the same department and then later becoming great friends! Those game nights and random-ass discussions were the one keeping me sane at home <3 Also 208 kaand yaar, kaise bhool sakte hai XD I’m glad we came clean out of that one. I kind of regret dropping so many hints about recent developments on the group, we should have surprised you in the VC only, maza aata :P Also, notes main sabko de deti hu okay? XD Let’s meet soon. Ofcourse we’re gonna keep in touch. All the best!
P.S. Loved your idea of giving Gavish that mood-changing plushie as a gift XD
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Subham, thanks for making me laugh so hard in the scorching heat in the testing line that day :P It was epic, wasn’t it? I realised that day how much more fun we could have had in the department together, if we had interacted more! That 203 nightout was lit too, glad you had fun watching me and Faizan just being crazy :P All the best for your future and yeah keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Avaniii!! We met quite late in our journey but it’s been one of the friendships I’m so grateful for. You’re always so kind and sweet and adorable to literally everyone, how do you have the energy to be positive all the time babe? Also, we have vibed over our crappy laptops so much XD Let’s both get an excellent one this time! That period in 5th semester when my sleep cycle was fucked up and I used to sleep after breakfast, meeting you in the mess used to brighten up my gloomy mornings. I’m so thankful that this will continue in our next walk of life. <3 I can’t wait to make breakfast with you and make fun of Anshika’s weird noises XD I had so much fun with you these last few months, not just in the wing but also that night in Dance room, you got great moves girl! I really love seeing you drunk (the Quarantine party night and when I saw you in front of SAC office XD), you're super cute. Okay, I’m officially gushing now XD I think we’ll be great together, what with our capacities of binge-watching content :P I can’t wait to start our journey as roommates together! See you super soon, love you <3
P.S. Yes your love life exists coz of me and I’m proud of it :P
P.P.S. One plus rocks and Dell sucks!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Priya and Tarun can fight over you, but we all know who was the first in your life after coming to IITK :P (Hehe take this suckers XD) But seriously, I love you and I’m gonna miss you so much. Yes, even when you take 45 minutes and a million outfits to get ready which annoys the hell out of me :P I know I’m not an easy person to be friends with, much less live with and you’ve gone above and beyond that, how did you even have the patience? XD
I meant what I said that night sobbing into your lap, and I always will <3 I guess that’s why I feel like I don’t have to write too much here, because you already know so much of it <3 You have been my one true constant in these 4 years and I know we will always have each other's backs. Will definitely meet soon :*
author: Ananya  Goswami

author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Jab mujhe koi nahi sambhal ya samjh pata hai, enter Ayush :P Thanks for being there for me throughout the whole Consulting thing. Somehow, you were the only one who knew the right things to say. I really wish hamare Delhi me milne ke plans ke beech me tera naam nahi aata XD I remember that whiteboard we drew of the whole web of interconnectedness we have and it was amazing, wasn’t it? Small world. You are someone who cares deeply, loves deeply and for me, I don’t think that’s a bad thing or that it’s too much. Because without people like you, people like us, the world won’t be a good enough place to live, so thanks for being that person. Thanks for being you. I’m sorry for the Lucknow thing and for just in general going out of the loop and being a bad friend. I really hope I’ll do better when I’m out of here. But I somehow feel that this bad habit of mine won’t affect our friendship. Even if we talk after months, it’s still the same and I love that. Also, ab group calls/games me aana start karde, bahut pitayi hogi nahi to. Huh, uncle hai tu poora. Anyway, milte hai jald.  Love you!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Ayush, thanks for all your help in IME692, passed that one coz of you <3 It has been fun knowing you since the first year. Hope we keep in touch, all the best!

text: Hey Ayush! I went on the Udaipur trip without even having heard your name before and it’s a decision I’ve never regretted! Thanks for being so fun and chill on the trip. I guess there were a few sensitive topics which were discussed on the trip and I wanna thank you for never divulging them outside <3 Also, I’m sorry for my intensity the one time we had a Facebook war on some issue XD I’m passionate about some things so I get that way lol. Anyway, it’s been amazing knowing you!  All the best for your future and yeah keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Baldip, We’re from the same city and coaching but never talked there and yaha aake whenever we had a conversation it was so much fun. I wish we could have interacted more in FIITJEE and IITK too. All the best!

text:
ESC101 lab me neighbours hone se PSO me saath dene tak ke liye dhanyawaad XD It’s been really fun hanging out with you whenever we have! Also, super fun to see your hairstyle transitions over the years :P All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch!
P.S. I'm getting faint memories of us interacting in CPA too, right? Long time man!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Chitranshi! Sorrrrry tere room nahi aayi XD But jab bhi Manisha ke room aayi and tune interrupt kiya, har baar maza to aaya :P Canteen me bhi har baar maza aaya tere saath. You’re so cute too! All the best for your future and keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Deeksha! You’re one of those people with whom I wish I had interacted more because every time that we have, it’s been amazing! Meeting you randomly in the canteen and having those meals together,ofcourse that reel night, every memory has been super fun! All the best for your future and keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: The 2 trips and the countless bulla sessions were fun with you. As was teasing you over your love of pink and lack of awareness about trains. XD It's been a real roller coaster ride with you!  Thanks for supporting me all those times <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Faizi boi, we partnered up in ESO 205 and have shared 205000000000 memories since then. From attending classes, labs together, getting thrown out of class for drinking tea, having night outs at the library to sharing life secrets with each other, it has been an amazing ride with you. Every trip I went on with you has been amazing because of you and the pictures too ofc :P I legit passed ESC201 because of you, still don’t have a clue on how that horrible breadboard works. Your PSO bet is invalid okay, you misguided me after end sems :P Landmark wali poori karungi pakka <3 Apni ek dinner date pending rahi uski <3 When I didn’t have dinner on day 1 after getting rejected, you made sure I ate, when I was upset over someone’s comments, you were the one who noticed in a room of 12 people and then made sure I felt better afterwards. You’ve seen me at my best and you’ve seen me at my every kind of worst and you stuck with me without ever making it about you. You are happy with me in my happiness and compassionate in my sadness, I love you so much for that. This innate kindness that you have inside of you is really precious and very very rare, I have seen it in very few people in my journey till now. Promise me you won't let that spirit of yours die, kitna bhi bada aadmi kyu na ban jaye tu, which ofcourse is gonna happen soon. Send me chocolates from US or I'll release your embarrassing pictures. (I don't even know why I make this threat every time when you have worse of mine) Do you know if I had to say someone’s name out of everyone who knew most about my life during IITK, it’s gonna be you without any doubt. That night in Goa, seeing you cry broke my heart because a person like you doesn’t deserve to cry at all. And yeah I'm going to try to remember the things bhand you said to me, and I'm gonna try to soak them up in my life too. I'm gonna miss just discussing mundane day-to-day things with you and just as easily discussing family lives and life decisions. I'm crappy at the phone call thing but I'll always pick up yours. I'm always one text or one call away from you, always remember that. Chapu tu hai hai, robo God, you'll excel at Minnesota as you have at IITK, all the best for that. And yes keep the reels coming :P Love you <3
P.S. Ab please maaf karde Mocha kaand ke liye? Ham donon ko :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

author: Ananya  Goswami

text: From asking for class notes to noting each others’ eccentric habits, we sure have come a long way. You’ve turned from just another random person in my department to my closest friend, my confidant,the person I have the most fun with, whether drunk or sober ;) I have no idea just when this transition happened, but I’ll eternally be grateful that it did. Being around you has always felt so easy, so natural and I never felt the need to modify or hide any part of myself. I cannot tell you how much I appreciate your acceptance of me because as you know I haven't met many people who actually have. How can I not mention the incredibly fun person that you are, every time we’ve hung out, whether that night with Arun et al, the Mocha night, the CBG night at my room or just me, you and Soumya grabbing shakes at mama mio, standing in front of hall 10 in the shade, I’ve discovered a new side of you, a new thing that I didn’t know. And this obviously hasn’t stopped now after 3rd XD  Having you by my side made everything easier, be it MSE, the lockdown or just life in general. Thanks for always (and I mean always) making me laugh, for being so incredibly patient around me, for all those library nightouts, for asking me for chai every 2 hours XD, for always having my back and for being the guy I can fall back on, any day of the year. Thanks for being you, and yeah obviously I love you <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
What you doin’? (What you doin’?)
Where you at? (Where you at?)
Oh, you got plans? (You got plans)
Don’t say that (Shut your trap)
I’m sippin’ wine (Sip, sip) in a robe (Drip, drip)
I look too good (Look too good)
To be alone (Woo, woo)
My house clean (House clean), my pool warm (Pool warm)
Just shaved, smooth like a newborn
We should be dancin’, romancin’
In the east wing and the west wing
Of this mansion, what’s happenin’?

I ain’t playin’ no games
Every word that I say is coming straight from the heart
So if you tryna lay in these arms

I’ma leave the door open
(I’ma leave the door open)
I’ma leave the door open, girl
(I’ma leave the door open, hopin’)
That you feel the way I feel
And you want me like I want you tonight, baby
Tell me that you’re coming through
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Arnav, thanks for your valuable help during the organ donation awareness campaign. It really helped me and CWC a lot! All the best for your future and yeah keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Gunjan! We might have had a few spats, what with both of us being hotheads XD, but I’m glad we’ve come out of that as friends! I love your fun-loving energy and it was so much fun being with all of you in those last days, can’t imagine them without you. Your stories have always surprised me. I wish we could  have met earlier and had deeper conversations and understood each other better. I’m gonna hold you to that treat for being born on 6th july since apparently Bhopal/Indore plan might still materialize :P Let’s play more board games and have loads of chocolate cake! Let’s keep in touch and all the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Hems (yes I’m still gonna call you hems), it has always been so fun hanging out with you, telling each other our secrets. I’m glad you’ve grown so much in the past years. Akshay and meri therapy yaad rakhna hamesha XD That new years was awesome, thanks for being there  and at various low points in my life. That train ride was awesome, remember? Although the 70's show wasn't :P And about that postcard, everything is forgiven and I hope you feel like yourself again <3 Let’s meet soon!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hello the-person-I-regret-not-interacting-more-with, I’ve always had fun when talking to you or hanging out with you and got so many positive vibes from you. It’s a shame we didn’t spend more time together. Also, I love the way you passionately speak for things you believe in and the way you debate, just hold onto that quality. Teri us treat ki vajah se itne saare amazing friends aaye meri life me, I’m so glad about that. Goa trip was so fun, let’s plan another trip soon <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Manish, I remember meeting you in front of CCD canteen with Inshu, that was the first time we properly talked despite being in the same branch. Loved your dedication for the cause you believed in. Organ donation camp ke time bhi itna helpful tha tu. Also 208 kaise bhool sakti hu XD Us time teri help ke bahut dhanyawad. Ham sab ke bachne me tera bhi haath tha, thanks for that. I wish we had interacted more. I hope we keep in touch, all the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Manishaaaaaa, kya hota mera tere bina. Tu lifeline rahi hai meri. One of the most mature girls in Y17 <3 You’re the Tarak Mehta to so many Jethalals, including me ofc :P Teri awesome maggi ko to main miss karungi hi usse kahi zyada teri sage advices and calm temperament ko karungi. DoAA canteen me wo chai peena lab ke baad, tujhe cycle pe bitha ke aate-jaate time gappe maarna, classes ke baad hall 6 canteen me khana, helping you pick out dresses, quarantine me hall 1 terrace pe ghanto walk karna, tujhe 3-4 ghante tak apni life ki latest developments batana, yeh sab kitna zyada miss karungi yaar main, they were some of my most carefree times of IITK. The way you handle everything life has thrown at you is extremely admirable and I wanna salute your perseverance and sincerity. I also am amazed at how you take care of your family, blood and the chosen IITK one, you are like the mama hen of so many chicks (me being one of them :P)
Yaar tere saath trip to kya outing bhi nahi ho payi, yeh regret hai mera. But we will surely make it up for it, we’re gonna meet again asap. It’s wonderful how we just get each other, and also what I feel is the best about us is that we don’t need to meet everyday to maintain our friendship, we can meet after a week and it’ll be the same <3 Just one wish of mine is still unfulfilled and that is seeing you drunk, I promise I’ll fulfill it some day (devil emoji) I miss you so much already! Stay the same please, the world needs more people like you! All the best for everything! Love you loads!
P.S. Thanks XD Will keep you updated :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Also I dont regret making you blush and laugh by teasing you with you-know-who's name in the middle of the lab :P
I still ship you both <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Medha! We met quite late, I’d actually say on the trip, which is quite sad, but nevertheless I’m so glad we did. You’re the best navigator one could ask for, and I had so much fun driving with you! I couldn’t have asked for a better scooty partner <3 You may not know this but when drunk-you complimented me that night, I really needed that, I was feeling quite low that time, so thanks for uplifting me! It’s mind-boggling how someone can be good at so manyyyy things like you are and still be so humble, you don’t get enough credit for that! You have inspired many of us to push ourselves, be better at time management and work hard. Your crush on Dootika ma’am is adorable sometimes :P Your stories are super interesting as well as your story-telling skills, I feel like I have already been to Meerut just by listening to them XD Thanks for always entertaining us with them! And yeah you’re officially the director/choreographer of the wing <3 Let’s meet soon! All the best for your future and stay in touch!
P.S. Loved your sneaky call when you guys saw us on RM 6th floor :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Aur Siddiqui sir, chai peeye? XD I can’t believe we got thrown out of class over tea XD It’s been so fun having you in the same department. Those library study sessions, the pre-exam night outs, CCD me TA se exam ke ek din pehle prof ki gossip lena XD , were all so fun with you! Dandiya night second year yaad hai? It was so fun! 3 saal ki journey me jab bhi pareshan kiya uske liye maafi <3 Rahi baat surprise ki, ab to digest karle XD Social media validation mil jaega I guess kuch dinon me :P Thanks for the DUGC compliment lol. All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch!
P.S. Keep the snaps coming!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Neelesh, I loved working with you and Arihant for the Prom Night and the subsequent treats we had (It was so much fun motivating Arihant to talk to you-know-who :P) Meri pending reh gayi yaar, koi nahi, hopefully our trio (jisme aur kisi ko add nahi karna hai XD) will meet soon and we’ll have a blast! You are one of the sweetest people of IITK apart from being calm and easy to talk to, please stay that way. All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch.
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Neha! I can’t believe we didn’t recognise each other after coming to IITK, even though we had met each other before! Small world. XD
You’re incredibly sweet and I felt this calm aura from you. I’m so glad we met that evening in old shop C and then on the final day in front of the football ground too! All the best for your future and keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
You might be Niko for the campus (hatefully or amicably :P), but you’ll always be Nikku for me <3 (P.S. Find a goddamn nickname for me, ab toh kaafi time/incidents ho gaye :P ) I was super shocked that night in Summers 2019 when you figured out that secret before anyone else. I wish we could have tested that theory of being each other’s lie detectors after that but I’m not disappointed because we sure have turned into sounding boards for each other's rants albeit on a particular topic XD. Tu itna helpful insaan hai, can’t thank you enough for that December thing and ofc the last month XD I’m so glad I acted like a baby and called you up in Goa that night, it was lit. You’re amazing, both as a friend and as the president, and I hope you know that. Also yeah, tu gaadi bahut acchi chalata hai and keys to aur bhi acche se sambhalta hai XD I hope we do keep in touch, regardless of anything.
P.S. Thank you for being 100% sure about this startup :P <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Nitik! It’s been fun having these random conversations with you which turn into amazing discussions! Your journey has been very interesting and I’m glad I got to witness some of it. How can I not mention our shared love for Tom & Jerry, Dogs and of course you know who :P I remember that Antaragni’19 night when we got the drinks together and then went from Hall 6 to events ground super drunk XD It was so fun seeing you that way lmao. Thanks for the amazing memories, super sweet attitude and fun gossips :P On that note, next time directly pooch lena meri gossip :P All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch!
P.S. Friends is hilarious okay!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Chandrayan-1, If I have to say who I have witnessed having the highest personal growth on campus, then my answer is gonna be you. I’m so glad I got to witness it and be part of your journey. Jitna bhi tere 4-6am, i.e. 2 ghante ke lagatar alarms ne mujhe annoy kiya hai, usse kahii zyada teri cute harkato and caring cheezo ne mujhe accha feel karaya hai. I remember, first year me tera “Nupur-Jaipur-Kanpur” was so cute and ofc Thunder. Accha hua tune and Avisha ne bigaada mujhe ‘khuragh’ samjha samjha ke, varna main vahi innocent bacchi reh jati XD Apne MTH101, PHY103 study sessions yaad hai? Kitna maza aata tha. Ham canteen trips maarne lagte the instead of studying lol. Also, harry potter forcefully dikhane ke liye bhi shukriya. I’m sorry for whenever my behaviour hurt you or made you angry. Last ke 2 months were so much with you and the wing. Jab tune cheezein share ki na mujhse recently, I felt so honored. I hope you know that I’ll always be there for you. I look forward to meeting you again soon hopefully <3 Love you loads <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Heyy Pragya (headpats) I have always loved being around you on the canteen trips or whenever you came to our room to talk to Avisha. Sorry not sorry for head patting you :P I really admire your passion and your dedication for so many things. Thanks for your guitar recommendation and helping me get started on it. <3 Stay the kind, helpful person you are! All the best for your future and keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Pratham! Loved your artwork on that wall XD All memories of our group are so special to me. Our gang was the first friends I had at IITK and I had so much fun with you every time we hung out, be it an unnecessary night out before Antaragni, treats at Little Chef, BBQ Nation, celebrating New Years, the fateful Blue World trip or just randomly in hall 2. I hope we keep in touch, all the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Pratham! Ek aur date pe chalega? :P That dinner and in fact every time I’ve hung out with you has been so so fun and has always lifted my spirits. From bitching about people to discussing your research work and serious social issues, it’s always been a pleasure. Hanging out in the event ground in Antaragni 19 with you guys will forever be one of my topmost festival memories. Do you remember the time we went to the NCL lab for your experiment and it ended up raining? It was so much fun.I’m so grateful that I got a friend like you and do you remember that conversation we had during this lockdown? I meant it all and I hope it brought a smile to your face <3. I couldn’t have asked for a better successor for OC, CWC and I’m proud of you for all you did. I know you’ll do great in life. All the best and let’s stay in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Bye baybayyyyy
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Priyaaaa! In first year I felt that you were the most serious out of all the ‘sisters’ IITK handed to me on my first day XD But after 4 years I can easily say you are the one who has made me laugh the most <3 Linguistic classes were fun coz of you (and the naps we got) and I’ll always remember you asking about a certain person in front of him XD We never had a chance to drift apart (thankfully) coz by second year you and Avisha had started hanging out. I’m gonna remember the second year summer hangouts we had, Jenga Squad anyone?, bitching about certain people, playing Jenga, eating chocolate cake. I remember I spilled rum on your salwar that night and your bewildered face as all the other 4 drunk girls in that room took their tops off XD You were definitely our third roommate and there’s no one else I’d rather be there. Out of all the people that were online that night in Goa, I texted you and Gavish only about that incident, I guess you can see how I felt so comfortable around you and felt like you’d be able to listen and comfort me. (I wasn’t wrong at all! <3 ) I’m gonna hold on to those words you said to me that night always. Ofcourse you’re extremely hardworking and that inspired me loads of time to push myself too. “Ananya kuch gossip de na!” Always gonna remember that sentence and your and Swadha's hopeful faces waiting for hot gossips XD! Your puns are amazing and so are you! Can’t wait to meet you soon! All the best for Stanford! 
P.S. hehe now I can see why folders with people’s names are weird but please forgive the Monica inside me XD 
P.P.S. None of us in the wing are gonna forgive you for telling us that 2nd floor washroom story :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: P.P.P.S. Goa would have been twice the fun with you <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey fellow Jr.Exec. Welcoming Biswa together and that lunch we all had was soo amazing right? I had a great time with you on the ride over and I hope you did too. I can’t believe I slept on the way back lol. We did keep in touch for sometime afterwards and then I guess life happened. All the best for your future and yeah let’s keep in touch again!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: हे राम! :P I’ve had so many great memories with you and our group, the night out before Antaragni first year, randomly hanging out in the canteen, the first outing which was Little Chef, celebrating new years, the surprising Blue World trip and so much more. You’ve always been so kind to me and I love your calm aura for the group! I know for a fact that you’re an extremely strong person and I’m in awe of you for that. Let’s keep in touch, all the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Ratnesh, thank you so much for your kind words! It was fun working with you. All the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: From being CPA buddies to being horror-movie partners, you’ve been an integral part of my IITK journey. Tere bina kya hi hota yaar mera? You’ve handled me at my worst and been by my side at my best. Second year summers me agar itna kuch hone ke baad bhi main stable thi, to it was because of you. Lol, remember when I came to your room to watch a movie and I felt so comfortable with you both that I slept there <3 You’ve grown a lot in these 4 years and I’m so glad I got to be a part of your journey. Let’s meet asap. Ahmedabad trip plan karte hai. (Only if you throw away that neon green shirt :P) Kitni treats pending hai teri, ameer ladka. Also thanks for saving all of us in 624 XD Paro meri hai and meri rahegi :P Love you!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Saurab, thank you so much for your kind words! It was fun working with you. All the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Jagga, I remember the lame joke parade you and Baheti always started whenever I used to visit Baheti’s room. I loved watching you two interact, it’s like you’re real siblings and not IITK ones. I have always found you very open-minded and easy to talk to! Stay the same and best of luck for your future!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Shreyash, I didn’t think there’d be much left to say after everything. But here it is. I don’t regret anything. You’re an amazing person and I will always cherish your friendship. And I hope that dinner in UC is the first of many more dinners to come. :)
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Dear unc-all, as difficult as telling you recent developments was, writing a memoir for you is doubly so. The manner in which we started talking was due to such unconventional circumstances, but the road ahead was a beautiful friendship which I hope will still continue after graduating. And I’m not counting your “assessments” of the group, okay?  Wo layover wala plan ho raha hai, mujhe kuch nahi pata. Lockdown me tujhse hi sabse zyada baatein hui hai meri. You were the one who knew everything going on in my life, and I knew everything in yours. I remember 1st December, sabse zyada khushi tere placement ki hui thi us din <3 Also, I’ll admit I do exaggerate my annoyance at the cheems language, sometimes I do find it cute (Soumya inserts “i’m cute about everything” Jake Peralta gif) People appreciate my gif game, but I’ve learnt from the best <3 The Pizza hut outing was lit as was hanging out with you in FMC room. I do wish we had met sooner, campus memories aur banate saath me. But we have time, I need you to always remember that. Indore nahi to Gurgaon/Bangalore zaroor milenge. Hormonal Wifey ke saath aur fights jo karni hai mujhe XD What I love the most about us is that we may fight like little kids but at the end of the day, I’ll have your back and you’ll have mine <3 The text you wrote on DUGC fam was the only time you made me both teary and speechless, so thanks for that, it meant a lot to us. For that and your constant komedi and just being you, thank you and love you!
Yours,
Aunty
P.S. We badly need a picture together! VC screenshots se ab zyada din kaam nahi chalega :P
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Bye Unc-alll
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: UNC-ALLLLLLLLLLLLL
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Suraj! I can say it’s been interesting witnessing your “psychic experiments”. I’m not sure I get the point but if it helped you somehow then it’s okay :P It’s been fun interacting with you in classes, labs and libraries. It felt comforting to see a familiar face on the ground floor of the library. I’m so glad we met that evening in old shop C and then on the final day in front of the football ground too! All the best for your future and keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Suraj! I can say it’s been interesting witnessing your “psychic experiments”. I’m not sure I get the point but if it helped you somehow then it’s okay :P It’s been fun interacting with you in classes, labs and libraries. It felt comforting to see a familiar face on the ground floor of the library. I’m so glad we met that evening in old shop C and then on the final day in front of the football ground too! All the best for your future and keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Swadha! I remember in first sem, we once went to the station together and I was thinking to myself how serious of a person you are. Cut to last semester, drunk -us vibing over some stupid thing. That’s an amazing journey we’ve had <3. You are a really caring and empathetic person and I wish we had interacted this much since the start just so I could have your amazing company for a longer time. You’re so hardworking, dedicated and passionate for your work and music, it’s really awe-inspiring! Thanks for all your help in PSO btw! XD The way you check up on people who might need checking up is really sweet and kind. I’m always going to remember how drunk you insisted upon and made sure I got drunk as well after I was late to the party, that was extremely cute.You’re the only person to whom I’ve given a lap dance to (and I sincerely hope it stays that way) and that too to such an amazing soundtrack :P I’m forever going to remember those creep-bitching sessions we had in those last days and your reactions to those stories, love your eyerolls. That treat at MClub is one of my favorite nights too because in the end only 4 of us (Pun Patrol) was left and it was eye-opening to know your experiences and share our stories! (How had we not done that sooner??) Speaking of favourite nights and least favourite mornings, the last day, sigh, I remember your face when I listen to ‘It ain’t me’ and am reminded of that emotional moment on 6th floor! Thanks for rolling the ball and making my goal of getting everyone to cry successful XD I hope we go on that trip soon! Can’t wait to see you again! All the best <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey Swapnil! Every memory I have with you guys is so special. You were one of my first friends at IITK and I had so much fun with you every time we hung out, be it an unnecessary night out before Antaragni, treats at Little Chef, BBQ Nation, celebrating New Years, the fateful Blue World trip or just randomly in hall 2. Your presence in the group has always been calming for me. I remember the 4 day 32 hour course we took together, wouldn’t have been able to get through it if it weren’t for you, thanks for that! All the best for your future and yeah keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Swasdick, you have been true to your name :P
But seriously, I’m always gonna remember that hour long amazing conversation we had in front of the Tutorial block which led to our amazing friendship in first year. Tere saath har break ke baad aake apni relationship discuss karne me jo maze aate the XD. We really were each other’s best friends, no? At least I considered you mine. I remember the events of that November and I felt so sad for you ofc but I felt so glad that you felt safe enough with me to confide in me and I was able to comfort you in some way. Remember I took you to the Ganpati pooja in the community centre and it turned out to be so much fun! Also, yaad hai tujhe Hall 6 ka bolne lage the log? XD I remember PHY102 endsems ke pehle ki shaam, I was sick and you came to teach me, you do such amazing things for your friends and basically give it your all, that’s something I’ve always admired about you. Also, your devotion for your family is really enviable, they’re lucky to have you as a son. We might have drifted apart afterwards but that doesn’t mean we can’t still steer our ships towards each other again? Let’s keep in touch and all the best!
P.S. Stop Simping and start getting over her please, you deserve so much better <3
P.P.S. I was very flattered by that conversation we recently had <3
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Heyy Utkarsh ‘deer’! Seems like you’re the biggest fan of my dad, more so than me XD Kaafi impress kar diya hai tumne unhe, he still asks me about you :P You’re one of the coolest people of IITK imo and I’m so grateful to have known you. You are like the wise, older friend who’s super fun as well. I’m always gonna remember that walk we had around OAT when you were intoxicated and we both were broken hearted and how great of a listener you are. Then on the trip that followed, you helped me get through it just by being there for me and making sure I was having fun. Loved the fish spa though, didn’t you? :P Also, thanks for making me my first drink ever and making sure I had fun that night, it’s one of my best memories ever! I remember on Pichola Lake when Faizan played that song and I guess we all got emotional but I started crying, you hugged me and made me feel that it was okay to not be okay then. I think about that moment a lot, whenever I think of that trip. You always have created a safe space for me to vent out and be real, can’t thank you enough for that. I miss your presence a lot and I really regret the fact that we didn’t hang out much in the latter parts of our campus life, I guess we both got a bit busy with our lives. I hope to amend that soon. (Call me!) Would love to go on an amazing trip with you again! All the best and don’t forget me when you do crack UPSC :P
P.S. You have amazing dance moves!!
P.P.S. Can’t believe I’ve slept so many times in the same bed/seat as you XD
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Baheti, as frequently as our nicknames for each other have changed, our dynamic hasn’t and I’m grateful for that. I’m also grateful for both of our PHY102 partners which pushed us towards each other and we became friends. I remember people speculated you to be Ayush when we first hung out in the Techkriti festival grounds. XD Book Club was also so much fun with you. I remember when I told you about my breakup, you didn’t understand how to handle such situations but you were still sensitive and caring enough to make me feel safe and cared for. I never felt judged by you and that’s a big thing considering you’re so chapu and the fact that we were in IITK XD I remember you were somehow always in your corridor and we used to have a chat before I went to Shreyash’s room. You were tracking me, weren’t you? :P I always had this Sheldon-like image of you and I’m extremely glad that you felt comfortable enough with me to share the Leonard parts with me too! I’m sorry you had to go through that, I can say from personal experience it’s not pretty. But you’re incredibly strong and you powered through and grew throughout it. I’m proud of you for that. Baaki aapke lame jokes and puns ke kya kehne XD Also, I really admire your work ethic and productivity, it must not be easy and I have no idea how you do it. Of Course the countless CBG nights and the whole Goa trip was super fun, although my secret mission of getting you drunk failed :P I will succeed someday, don’t you worry! Needless to say, ofc we’ll stay in touch and I don’t even need to wish you the best of luck because of how freaking awesome you are <3
P.S. I loved the card as well the stealth with which you made sure it reached me XD
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: BYE
author: Ananya  Goswami

text: Hey, It was always nice working with you, whether in Book Club or in that disastrous Microeco course. You have a very calm temperament around you, stay the same. Best of luck!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Yash! 
It’s true our interactions were mostly formal and I wish I could have interacted more with you apart from the Senate or CWC. Thanks for always being such a supportive Chairperson. I loved the post-meeting conversation we had in that SYMP meeting. You’ve been so inspirational with the way you managed the Senate work and your own academics. Let’s keep in touch and I hope we meet again! All the best!
author: Ananya  Goswami

text:
Hey Yashika! You are the best case partner one could ask for! I couldn’t have gone through that time without you. No matter what happened, I’m so glad we got to experience it together and last me BCG ko gaaliyan dene me bhi maza aaya tha XD
All the best for your future and let’s keep in touch!
author: Ananya  Goswami
